description.en:
Maeda is a new student in the Teiken High School. He stutters when he's nervous and he's rather clumsy. He gets noted immediately because he hits a teacher during the entrance ceremony. Some clubs search to enlist him as they see in him a force they can use to get even with other clubs. But Maeda is a loner and has only one dream: becoming boxing champion. His first objective is to beat the leader of the boxing club. "Rokudenashi" translates as "good for nothing".  
  
The manga focuses more on gang warfare than boxing.
description.es:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.
description.vi:
Maeda Taison, chàng thiếu niên tới từ Osaka mang trong mình ước mơ trở thành nhà vô địch boxing thế giới. Xuyên suốt 3 năm học của cậu không chỉ là những trận đánh, những xung đột mà còn có cả những câu chuyện đầy tính nhân văn.
Huyền thoại của dòng manga yankee Nhật Bản, dù đã kết thúc từ năm 1997 nhưng Rokudenashi Blues (RB) vẫn đang là bộ manga yankee bán chạy nhất mọi thời đại. Vì kết thúc đã lâu nên nội dung của nó có phần "outdate", tuy nhiên vẫn rất đáng đọc.
description.es-la:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.

description.en:
A world of constant war because we don't understand each other's differences.
A world where it is normal to hate and harm other species.
In this hellish world where blood is splashed and people kill and kill each other, how can a boy named Rito survive?
A medieval dark fantasy of humans and xenomorphs.
description.ko:
서로의 다름을 이해 못 해 끊임없는 전쟁이 벌어지는 세계.
타종을 혐오하고 해하는 것이 당연한 세계.
피가 튀고 서로가 죽고 죽이는
이 지옥 같은 세계에서 소년 '리토'는
과연 어떻게 살아남을 것인가.

인간과 이종족들이 벌이는 중세 다크 판타지

title.en: Mezase Gouka Kyakusen!! ~Sen Shokan Skill De Isekai Rich Life Wo Te Ni Irero~

altTitles.ja: めざせ豪華客船!!　～船召喚スキルで異世界リッチライフを手に入れろ～

altTitles.ko: 노려라 호화객선!! 배 소환 스킬로 이세계 부자 라이프를 손에 넣어라

altTitles.en: Striving for the Luxury Liner!! Get that Rich Isekai Life with a Ship Summoning Skill

description.en: After falling into the ocean, Wataru Toyoumi, finds himself reincarnated in another world! Armed with a skill to allow him to summon boats, he plans to get rich and live a happy life aboard his very own luxury liner.

Taiki Inomata is on the boys' badminton team at sports powerhouse Eimei Junior and Senior High. He's in love with basketball player Chinatsu Kano, the older girl he trains alongside every morning in the gym. One Spring day, their relationship takes a sharp turn ... And thus begins this brand-new series of love, sports and youth!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2023)
description.fr:
Taiki Inomata, membre du club de badminton, a eu le coup de foudre pour Chinatsu Kano, la star du club de basket de son établissement. Il s'entraîne à ses côtés tous les matins. Sa relation avec Chinatsu va prendre un tournant totalement inédit lorsqu'un jour de printemps, une nouvelle des plus déconcertantes va lui offrir une opportunité inespérée de conquérir sa belle.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Delcourt/Tonkam**
description.ja: バドミントン部に所属する猪股大喜（いのまたたいき）は、女子バスケ部の先輩・鹿野千夏（かのちなつ）に恋をしていた――。自主練を真摯に取り組む姿に心惹かれていたが、思いもよらぬ事実が発覚し…!?　道のりは遠く、想いは近く。
description.kk: Тайки Иномата - спортқа терең бағытталған Еймей орта және жоғары мектебінің бадминтон тобында ойнайды. Ол әр таң сайын мектеп спортзалында онымен бірге жаттығатын Чинацу Кано атты үздік баскетболшы сенпайға ғашық. Бір күні олардың қарым - қатынасы өзгеріске ұшырап, арасындағы қашықтық жойыла бастады... Осылай, көктемнің бір кезінде мектеп спорт залында тағы да бір махаббат, спорт және жастық шақ оқиғасы басталды.
description.tl: Si Taiki Inomata ay nasa boys' badminton team na sports powerhouse ng Eimei Junior at Senior High. In love siya sa basketball player na si Chinatsu Kano, ang babaeng mas matanda sa kaniya na kasama niya magpraktis kada umaga sa gym. Isang araw, ang kanilang relasyon ay biglang nagbago.
description.uk:
Тайкі Іномата — учасник команди з бадмінтону, який вчиться у школі Еймей. Щодня він намагається прийти до школи якомога раніше, але його завжди випереджає Чінацу Кано, в яку він закоханий.

Чінацу — зірка команди з баскетболу. Хоч Тайкі добре грає в бадмінтон, він далеко не настільки популярний, як Чінацу, що робить шанси на взаємну симпатію низькими. Але за дивним поворотом долі Чінацу починає жити в його будинку.
description.vi:
Taiki Inomata, năm ba sơ trung, là thành viên của đội cầu lông. Kể từ khi tập luyện cùng với đội cầu lông, cậu luôn cố đến sớm nhất có thể, thế nhưng, cậu chỉ là người thứ hai đến nhà đa năng. Bởi vì người đầu tiên luôn đến sớm nhất, chính là Chinatsu Kano, năm nhất cao trung, và là người mà cậu thích.

Vì sự chênh lệch giữa mức độ nổi tiếng mà cậu cảm thấy mình không thể kéo gần khoảng cách với cô ấy. Thế nhưng...

Vào một ngày đẹp trời, vì chuyện gia đình, Chinatsu Kano đã đến sống chung với Taiki Inomata.

Với cơ hội ngàn năm có một này, với cái flag romcom to hơn núi Phú Sĩ này, liệu rằng cậu chàng Taiki có thể làm nên chuyện hay không?
description.es-la: Taiki Inomata forma parte del equipo masculino de bádminton en el prestigioso instituto deportivo Eimei Junior y Senior High. Su corazón late por Chinatsu Kano, la hábil jugadora de baloncesto con la que comparte entrenamientos matutinos en el gimnasio. En un día primaveral, su relación da un giro sorprendente… Y así se inicia esta nueva serie que combina amor, deportes y la efervescencia de la juventud.
description.pt-br: Taiki Inomata está na equipe de Badminton dos meninos na Powerhouse Esportiva Eimei Junior e Senior High. Ele está apaixonado por jogador de basquete Chinatsu Kano, a menina mais velha que ele treina ao lado de todas as manhãs no ginásio. Um dia de primavera, seu relacionamento tem uma virada acentuada ... e assim começa esta nova série de amor, esportes e jovens!

altTitles.ja: ポケットモンスターSPECIAL スカーレット・バイオレット

description.en: Violet, the “prince of speed” who drives Miraidon, runs through the Paldea region in search of the “secret spice” to regain the ability of Miraidon! A showdown with the Nushi Pokemon! Operation Stardust! And the other main character...!?
description.es: Violet, el “príncipe de la velocidad” que conduce a Miraidon, corre por la región de Paldea en busca de la “especia secreta” para recuperar la habilidad de Miraidon. ¡Un enfrentamiento con el Pokémon Nushi! ¡Operación Polvo de Estrellas! ¿¡Y el otro personaje principal...!?
description.ja: ミライドンを駆る“スピード王子”バイオレットが、ミライドンの能力を取り戻すべく「秘伝スパイス」を求めてパルデア地方を駆け巡る！　ヌシポケモンとの対決！　スターダスト作戦！　そしてもう一人の主人公は…!?

title.en: The Story of a Waitress and Her Customer

altTitles.ja-ro: Toaru Tenin to Kyaku no Hanashi

altTitles.fr: L'histoire d'une serveuse et de son client

altTitles.es: La historia de una camarera y su cliente

description.en: Saki, a college student working at an izakaya, has a crush on Shiraishi, an office worker who is a regular customer. Be brave for your first love today! I gave him a love letter and… Shiraishi also has no experience in love?! A heartwarming love comedy♪
description.es: Saki, una estudiante universitaria que trabaja en un bar de estilo izakaya, esta enamorada de Shiraishi, un oficinista que es un cliente regular en el bar. ¡Sé valiente por tu primer amor hoy! Le dí una carta de amor y… ¿¡Shiraishi tampoco tiene experiencia con el amor!? Una acogedora comedia romántica♪
description.uk: Сакі, студентка коледжу, яка працює в ізакаї, закохана у постійного клієнта Шіраїші. Протягом багатьох місяців вона хотіла розповісти йому про свої почуття. На жаль, через відсутність сміливості її любовний лист так і залишався не доставленим протягом півроку. Однак, нарешті настав день, коли вона його йому віддасть. Це початок зворушливої ​​історії між офіціанткою та її клієнтом.

description.en:
(from ebookjapan):

Shizuka Katsuragi is a female detective who loves silencers. She is assigned to the "annex" of the Community Safety Division, a hive of activity in the Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department.

 Her partner is Kenya Iha, the most eccentric person in the Metropolitan Police Department. The pairing of the two is a strange one, as they both pull each other down. 

With the policy of "conquer poison with poison," her beloved gun quietly blows fire today...

altTitles.ja-ro: Manga de Yomu: Taketori Monogatari, Uji Shuui Monogatari

altTitles.ja: まんがで読む 竹取物語・宇治拾遺物語
竹取物語: 創業90周年企画

description.en:
As part of the Manga Classic Literature (Koten Bungaku) series, Ikeda adapts for manga the tale of the bamboo cutter. This is a Japanese folk-tale dating from the 10th century.   
One day, an old and childless bamboo cutter discovers a child inside a glowing bamboo plant.   
The child grows up into a beautiful lady, Kaguya Hime (Princess Kaguya) and the news of her unusual beauty spreads around…

A group of powerful beings called tenkaijin are holding a special tournament. The rules of the game–each tenkaijin selects a kid in junior high to be his champion and grants him a special power. The kids take each other on in heated battle, but if they hurt innocent bystanders, then they lose one of their natural-given abilities. Every time they win a battle, they gain a new ability. The ultimate winner of the tournament is granted any power of his choosing, and the tenkajin who he represents succeeds in becoming the next god. Kosuke Ueki has been chosen to fight in the tournament. His special power–the ability to turn garbage into trees.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **The Law of Ueki** (2006)

altTitles.ja: ゴーストフィクサーズ

description.en: Following a certain event, Mikurigaoka New Town transformed into a crucible of supernatural phenomena known as GHOSTS! In said town lives Hifumi, a middle school boy, who one day encounters a girl who just moved in... Help "correct" the supernatural in this action-packed tale from Yasuki Tanaka, creator of "Summer Time Rendering"!

altTitles.ja: 放課後プレイ High Heels

description.en:
In the Houkago Play Series:  
  
V.1: 4-koma about a high-school gamer and his bossy but tsundere girlfriend.  
V.2: About a gamer and his mangaka girlfriend.  
V.3: About a boy and a girl who are both gamers, though they play with different styles.  
V.4: R  
V.5: High Heels  
V.6: Maniax  
V.7: High Heels 2  
V.8: High Heels 3

Fujiyama Shinobu aka Sexy Fujiyama, is a general working for the evil Flower Bud Gang who are trying to take over the city. Standing in her way is the masked magical girl, Princess Mamu, who wouldn't you know it, has just moved in next door to Fujiyama's place...
description.ja: 悪の組織の女幹部セクシーフジヤマ（本名・藤山忍）。正義の魔法少女との戦いに負け続けた彼女は組織からの罰則金で金欠に陥っていた…。そんなある日、隣の部屋に憎っくき魔法少女プリンセス・マム（本名・真白まむ）が引っ越してきて…。

title.en: Yondome wa Iya na Shizokusei Majutsushi

altTitles.ja: 四度目は嫌な死属性魔術師

altTitles.ja-ro: Yondome wa Iya na Shi Zokusei Majutsushi
Yondome ha Iya na Shizokusei Majutsushi

altTitles.en: The Death Mage Who Doesn't Want a Fourth Time
The Death Attribute Magician Who Wants To Avoid A Fourth Time

altTitles.ru: Маг смерти, не желающий четвёртой реинкарнации

altTitles.zh: 讨厌第四次的死属性魔术师

altTitles.zh-hk: 討厭第四次的死屬性魔術師

altTitles.ko-ro: Shi-dome wa Iyana Shi Zokusei Majutsu-shi

altTitles.fa: جادوگر مرگی که نمیخواد واسه بار چهارم تناسخ پیدا کنه

altTitles.es-la: El Nigromante que No Quiere una Cuarta Vez
El Mago del Atributo de Muerte que No Quiere una Cuarta Vez

description.en:
Amamiya Hiroto is unlucky. His life consisted of misfortune after misfortune, culminating in an unlucky death during an incident on a school boat trip, trying to save a girl he barely knew. After death, he met a god of reincarnation who requested that the hundred or so dead passengers - one of them being the girl he tried in vain to save - be reincarnated into another world. Yet a series of unfortunate events forced Hiroto to reincarnate with even less luck than before, starting with nothing but a tremendous amount of Mana. His second life, far worse than his first, came to a cruel end. However, upon meeting the god a second time, he was informed that there would be yet another reincarnation, one that had already been set in motion and could not be stopped. Not wanting Hiroto to endure a third life filled with suffering, the god cursed him before he was reborn in the hopes that he would either die quickly or commit suicide. Hiroto was reborn once more as a half-vampire, half-dark elf. A dhampir. Not wanting a fourth life, he is determined to live this third life with the only things remaining from his previous lives - Death Magic and his enormous Mana pool.
___
**Character Designer:** [Ban!](https://mangadex.org/author/ecb0d0e9-d2ac-44fd-b40c-52ee54a2c336)
description.fa:
امامیا هیروتو یه بدبخته بدشانسه که تو اردو مدرسش به کشتیشون حمله میشه و در راه نجات دختری که حتی نمیشناسش میمیره، بعد مرگش خدا رو میبینه که میخواد تمام کسایی که داخل حادثه ی کشتی مردن رو به یه دنیای دیگه تناسخ کنه
به هرحال بعد کلی بدبختی و بدشانسی اون زندگی دومش رو با مقدار زیادی مانا شروع کرد ولی زندگی دومش حتی بدتر از زندگیه اولش به پایان رسید
به هرحال بعد مرگ دومش دوباره خدارو دید و خدا بهش گفت که زندگیه سومی هم درکاره ولی خدا نمیخواست تو زندگی سومش دوباره بدبختی و زجر رو تحمل کنه برای همین اونو نفرین کرد که یا سریع بمیره یا خودکشی کنه
این دفه هیروتو به عنوان یه دامپیر تناسخ کرد و قصد نداره یه زندگیه چهارم رو تجربه کنه برای همین با چیزایی که از زندگی های قبلیش داره یعنی مانای خیلی زیاد و جادوی مرگ میخواد کارای ناتمومش رو تموم کنه
description.ru:
Главному герою Амамия Хирото не везёт. Его жизнь состоит из цепочки неудач и в конце концов он умирает вследствие несчастного случая на корабле во время школьной экскурсии, погибнув при попытке спасти девушку, которую он едва знал. После смерти он встречает Бога Реинкарнации, которому требуются около ста мертвых пассажиров — среди которых девушка, которую он безуспешно пытался спасти — для перерождения в другом мире. Однако череда несчастливых событий вынуждает Хирото переродиться с ещё меньшей удачей, чем раньше, не имея в начале пути ничего, кроме огромного количества маны. Его вторая жизнь, что была гораздо хуже первой, приводит его к жестокому концу. Несмотря на это, встретившись с Богом в третий раз, он узнает, что будет и третья реинкарнация – она уже запущена и не может быть отменена. Не желая, чтобы Хирото вновь претерпевал жизнь, полную страданий, перед его перерождением Бог проклинает его, в надежде, что Хирото либо умрет быстро, либо совершит самоубийство. На сей раз Хирото переродился как наполовину вампир, наполовину тёмный эльф – дампир. Желая избежать четвёртой реинкарнации, он настроен прожить третью жизнь со способностями, что достались ему от предыдущих – Магией Смерти и Бассейном Маны.  
  
  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/bravekid0218)
description.es-la:
Amamiya Hiroto tuvo una vida desafortunada. Su vida consistió en desgracia tras desgracia, culminando en una desafortunada muerte durante un incidente en su viaje escolar en barco, al intentar salvar a una chica que apenas conocía. Después de morir, a Hiroto y al centenar de pasajeros muertos se les brindó una propuesta proveniente de un dios de la reencarnación. Así fue como ellos reencarnaron en otro mundo.

Sin embargo, por una serie de desafortunados y extraños acontecimientos, Hiroto fue forzado a reencarnar con muchísima menos suerte de la poca que ya tenía antes, comenzando así su segunda y desafortunada vida, únicamente con una tremenda cantidad de maná, por lo que su segunda vida fue mucho peor que la primera, concluyendo con un cruel final.

A pesar de ello, al encontrarse con ese estúpido dios por segunda vez, se le informó que tendría una tercera vida, que ya había sido puesta en marcha y no era posible evitarla. El dios, al no querer que Hiroto sufriera una tercera vida igual de cruel y llena de sufrimientos que la anterior, lo maldijo antes de que renaciera con la esperanza de que muriera rápidamente o se suicidara.

title.en: Yuusha to Yobareta Nochi ni - Soshite Musou Otoko wa Kazoku wo Tsukuru

altTitles.ja: 勇者と呼ばれた後に ―そして無双男は家族を創る―

altTitles.ja-ro: Yuusha to Yobareta Ato ni - Soshite Musou Otoko wa Kazoku wo Tsukuru

altTitles.en: After Being Called a Hero: The Unrivaled Man Starts a Family

description.en: In a world where humans and demons clash, the one who decimated the Demon Lord's army was a lone hero named Lloyd. Possessing power so immense that he was said by the Demon Lord to be near godlike, after the war, Lloyd was appointed by the king to be the lord of a remote territory and was sent far away. Furthermore, he was tasked with subduing the Emperor Dragon residing in that land, which he quickly defeated. However, the defeated dragon transformed into a beautiful woman and chose to become Lloyd's companion!?
description.ja: 人間と魔族が争う世界――魔王軍を壊滅させたのはたったひとりの勇者、ロイドという男だった。魔王から神に近いとまで言われた力を持つロイドは戦後、王により辺境の領主を命じられ、遠ざけられた。さらにその地に棲む皇帝竜の討伐も頼まれたが、早々に倒してしまう。しかし敗れた竜は、美しい女性に変化し、ロイドの伴侶になることに!?これは最強と呼ばれながらも自分自身の価値を見つけられなかった男が「家族」を見つける物語。

altTitles.th: เดอะ นิวเกท

description.az: "The New Gate" adlı onlayn oyunun ölüm oyununa çevrilməsi nəticəsində on minlərlə oyunçu bu oyunda ilişib qalır. Lakin ən güclü və keçmiş oyunçulardan biri olan Şinin səyləri nəticəsində bütün oyunçular oyundan çıxa bilirlər. Lakin Şin ən sonuncu bossu məğlub edib hər kəsi azad edəndə qəribə işıq görür və qəflətən özünü 500 il gələcəkdəki oyun dünyasında tapır.
description.en:
The New Gate — an online game transformed into a life-and-death struggle for its players.

Thanks to the valiant efforts of Shin, the most powerful of them all, an end to the game and freedom for everyone seemed within reach. But just moments after Shin defeats the game’s final boss, he finds himself bathed in an unknown light and transported some 500 years into the future of the in-game world!

Thrown from a simple game gone wrong into a strange new land, one young swordsman of unrivalled strength is about to embark on a legendary journey!
description.es: "THE NEW GATE", un juego online que se había convertido en un juego de la muerte, ahora estaba liberando a las decenas de miles de jugadores que habían sido arrastrados, gracias a los esfuerzos de Shin, uno de los jugadores más antiguos. Pero después de haber derrotado al último jefe y liberado a todos, fue tragado por una luz extraña y se encontró dentro del mundo del juego 500 años en el futuro.
description.ja:
数万人を巻き込んでデスゲームと化したオンラインゲーム「THE NEW GATE（ザ・ニューゲート）」は、最古参プレイヤー・シンの活躍によりついに解放のときを迎えようとしていた。しかし最後のボスを倒し脱出することができたと思った瞬間、
突如未知の光を浴び、500年後のゲーム世界に飛ばされてしまう！最強プレイヤーの新たなる無双バトル伝説開幕！

[Video Preview](https://youtu.be/YyB2MNkrpfw)
description.ru: «Новые Врата» — смертельная игра, которая не отпускает десятки тысяч игроков. Шин — как раз один из таких геймеров. Он побеждает последнего босса и освобождает всех людей из смертельной ловушки, но самого его охватывает яркий свет и он переносится на 500 лет вперед.
description.th:
[THE NEW GATE] เกมแนว VRMMO-RPG
ซึ่งกลายเป็นเดธเกมนั้นได้มาถึงช่วงเวลา
แห่งการปลดปล่อย
เพราะความพยายามของเพลเยอร์ (ผู้เล่น)
ที่แข็งแกร่งที่สุดนามว่า ชิน
ทว่า ทันทีที่เขาโค่นมอนสเตอร์ตัวสุดท้ายลง
อยู่ๆ ประตูที่อยู่ด้านในสุดก็เปิดออก และทำให้ชิน
ซึ่งอาบแสงปริศนาที่สาดส่องเข้ามาหมดสติไป—
เมื่อเขาลืมตาตื่นขึ้นมาอีกครั้ง ก็ปรากฏภาพ
ของโลกของ [THE NEW GATE]
ที่กลายเป็นของจริงขึ้นมา...!!
description.tr: "The New Gate", oyuncularını tuzağa düşüren ve bir ölüm oyununa dönüşen çevrimiçi bir oyundur ve en güçlü oyunculardan biri olan Shin'in çabaları sayesinde oyunu sürüklenen binlerce oyuncuyu serbest bırakmaktadır. Ancak son patronu yendikten ve herkesi özgür bıraktıktan sonra, tuhaf bir ışık tarafından yutulmuş ve kendini oyun dünyasında 500 yıl sonrasında, oradan çıkamayan bir durumda bulmuştur.
description.es-la: "THE NEW GATE", un juego online que se había convertido en un juego de la muerte, ahora estaba liberando a las decenas de miles de jugadores que habían sido arrastrados, gracias a los esfuerzos de Shin, uno de los jugadores más antiguos. Pero después de haber derrotado al último jefe y liberado a todos, fue tragado por una luz extraña y se encontró dentro del mundo del juego 500 años en el futuro.

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい!

description.en:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga  
  
- **Retail:** (Direct Retail From the Mangaka)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/0e9KPgq.png) [Official Melon Books](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/circle/index.php?circle_id=3753)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/t9hf4kQ.png) [Official Toranoana](https://ec.toranoana.shop/tora/ec/cot/circle/2UPA116P847KdC6Rd687/all/)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/lGJEbPa.png) [Official DLSite](https://www.dlsite.com/home/circle/profile/=/maker_id/RG40614.html) (jp)
description.pt-br: Oyama Mahiro, um dia acordou como uma garota graças a sua irmã que colocou uma droga em sua comida, após ter visto eroges a noite toda. Um mangá de comédia sobre um garoto que se transformou em uma mulher.

description.en: The story is loosely based on the Three Kingdoms period, using both real and original characters and events from the historical period in Chinese history and folklore of the Romance of the Three Kingdoms.

title.en: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? II

altTitles.en: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? II

altTitles.ja-ro: Dungeon ni Deai o Motomeru no wa Machigatte Iru Darou ka 2

altTitles.ru: Может, я встречу тебя в подземелье? 2

altTitles.ja: ダンジョンに出会いを求めるのは間違っているだろうかⅡ

altTitles.ja-ro: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka II

description.en: Adventurer Bell Cranell's life changed forever when he met the goddess Hestia, becoming the first member of her familia. Since then, he’s gone on many adventures, growing much stronger in the process. But when he steps foot into Orario’s pleasure quarter, where Ishtar Familia reigns supreme, he soon finds himself in way over his head... With enemies all around him, he’ll need the help of a beautiful, fox-eared courtesan if he’s to have any hope of making it back home!
description.ru: Огромный город Орарио - всего лишь вход в подземный лабиринт, широко известный как "Подземелье". Люди приходят туда за славой, честью, приходят, надеясь получить все то, что захотят. И именно здесь парень, мечтающий стать авантюристом, знакомится с маленькой богиней, не нашедшей ни одного последователя. Продолжение "Может, я встречу тебя в подземелье?" от Оомори Фуджино с новым художником Ямачи Тайсей.

description.en:
From classmates to brother and sister, living under the same roof.

After his father’s remarriage, Asamura Yuuta ends up getting a new stepsister, coincidentally the number one beauty of the school year, Ayase Saki. Having learned important values when it comes to man-woman relationships through the previous ones of their parents, they promise each other not to be too close, not to be too opposing, and to merely keep a vague and comfortable distance.

On one hand, Saki, who has worked in solitude for the sake of her family, doesn’t know how to properly rely on others, whereas Yuta is unsure of how to really treat her. Standing on fairly equal ground, these two slowly learn the comfortable sensation of living together.

Their relationship slowly evolves from being strangers the more the days pass. Eventually, this could end up in a story about love for all we know.
description.pt-br:
De colegas de classe a irmão e irmã, vivendo sob o mesmo teto.

Após o novo casamento de seu pai, Asamura Yuuta acaba ganhando uma nova meia-irmã, coincidentemente a beleza número um do ano escolar, Ayase Saki. Tendo aprendido valores importantes no que diz respeito aos relacionamentos homem-mulher através dos anteriores de seus pais, eles prometem um ao outro não ser muito próximos, não ser muito opostos e apenas manter uma distância vaga e confortável.

Por um lado, Saki, que trabalhou sozinha pelo bem de sua família, não sabe como confiar adequadamente nos outros, enquanto Yuta não tem certeza de como realmente tratá-la. Estando em terreno bastante igual, os dois aprendem lentamente a sensação confortável de viver juntos.

O relacionamento deles evolui lentamente de estranhos à medida que os dias passam. Eventualmente, isso pode acabar em uma história sobre o amor, pelo que sabemos.

altTitles.en: Goblin Slayer! Side Story: Year One

altTitles.ja: ゴブリンスレイヤー外伝：イヤーワン

altTitles.zh-hk: 哥布林殺手外傳：第一年

altTitles.vi: Kẻ Diệt Yêu Tinh: Năm Thứ Nhất
Dũng Sĩ Diệt Yêu Tinh: Năm Thứ Nhất

description.en: A prequel series revealing Goblin Slayer's past and the events that led him to become an adventurer with the sole purpose of exterminating all goblins from the world.
description.pl:
Prequel ujawniający przeszłość Goblin Slayer'a i wydarzenia, które doprowadziły go do zostania poszukiwaczem przygód, któremu przyświeca wyłącznie jeden cel: eksterminacja wszystkich goblinów. ~M  
  


---

  
**Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/GoblinSlayer_GA)  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Manga Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/kentosakaeda)  
- [Official LN (JP)](https://www.ganganonline.com/contents/goblinyo/)  
- [Official LN (EN)](https://yenpress.com/series-search/?series=yen346-goblin-slayer-side-story-year-one-light-novel)  
- [Official Anime (JP)](http://www.goblinslayer.jp/)
description.pt: Uma série de prequel que revela o passado de Goblin Slayer e os eventos que o levaram a se tornar um aventureiro com o único propósito de exterminar todos os goblins do mundo.
description.ru: События манги перенесут нас на 5 лет назад, в то время, когда Убийца Гоблинов только закончил свои тренировки и расстался с мастером. Манга поведает нам о том, чем занимался Убийца Гоблинов все эти 5 лет до встречи с Жрицей.
description.vi: Tiền truyện tiết lộ quá khứ của Kẻ Diệt Yêu Tinh và những sự kiện đã đưa anh trở thành một nhà thám hiểm với mục tiêu duy nhất là tiêu diệt toàn bộ yêu tinh trên thế giới

altTitles.ja: ふたりぼっちのオタサーの姫

altTitles.ja-ro: Futaribocchi no Otaku Circle no Hime

altTitles.en: The Otaku Circle's Princess in a Club of Two

description.en: Ooyama Takeko joins an otaku club in the hopes of being worshiped as a princess as she'd be the only female member, but the club she joins only has two members (including herself). Based on a one shot of the same name.
description.ja: 『小林さんちのメイドラゴン』などアニメ化多数の大人気作家が、初の週刊連載でYJに大登場！ 「ヲタクさんたちに”ちやほや”されたい！」 ”姫”を目指して大山武子が入ったオタサーは…、部員が二人しかいなかった！ 1年たっても二人っきりのサークルで、大山は立派な姫になれるのか!? 満たせ欲求！目指せ姫！天然ダメっ娘オタサーコメディ、開幕！

description.en: Mini is a "Scum Detector", and her latest job is from a rich girl who wants to test her boyfriend's loyalty. However, her boyfriend, Zhao Yueming, is a straightforward gentleman, and Mini's usual methods don't work on him. This is a bit tricky for Mini, who is used to dealing with scumbags regularly. This game of tug-of-war between the womanizer and the one who understands them best is about to begin. Who will fall into the trap of love first?!

Losing a loved one is so painful that one may sometimes wish to be able to resurrect them—a weakness that the enigmatic Millennium Earl exploits. To make his mechanical weapons known as "Akuma," he uses the souls of the dead that are called back. Once a soul is placed in an Akuma, it is trapped forever, and the only way to save them is to exorcise them from their vessel using the Anti-Akuma weapon, "Innocence."  
  
After spending three years as the disciple of General Cross, Allen Walker is sent to the Black Order—an organization comprised of those willing to fight Akuma and the Millennium Earl—to become an official Exorcist. With an arm as his Innocence and a cursed eye that can see the suffering souls within an Akuma, it's up to Allen and his fellow Exorcists to stop the Millennium Earl's ultimate plot: one that can lead to the destruction of the world.
description.ru: Действие манги разворачивается в альтернативной Европе конца 19 века. Мир заселен Акума - созданиями Тысячелетнего Графа, созданными из механизма и человеческой души. Те, кто могут уничтожать Акума и освобождать души заключенные в них, называются экзорцистами, которые наделены некой Чистой Силой. Главный герой манги - Аллен Уолкер, юноша пятнадцати лет, проклятый Акума, носитель Чистой Силы в его левой руке. Путь Аллена Уолкера связан с его любовью к людям и Акума, путь, который принесет ему много неожиданностей…
description.pt-br:
Perder um ente querido é tão doloroso que às vezes podemos desejar ressuscitá-lo - uma fraqueza que o enigmático Conde do Millennium explora. Para tornar suas armas mecânicas conhecidas como “Akuma”, ele usa as almas dos mortos que são chamadas de volta. Uma vez que uma alma é colocada em um Akuma, ela fica presa para sempre, e a única maneira de salvá-la é exorcizá-la de seu recipiente usando a arma Anti-Akuma, "Inocência".

Depois de passar três anos como discípulo do General Cross, Allen Walker é enviado para a Ordem Negra – uma organização composta por aqueles dispostos a lutar contra Akuma e o Conde do Milênio – para se tornar um Exorcista oficial. Com um braço como sua Inocência e um olho amaldiçoado que pode ver as almas sofredoras dentro de um Akuma, cabe a Allen e seus colegas Exorcistas impedir a trama final do Conde do Millennium: uma que pode levar à destruição do mundo.

description.en:
As Lee Yeo-ju hums a song that comforted her during her long hospital stay, she is approached by an idol star named Park Jae-ha, whom she has only seen in videos. 

"I'll help you. You need money for the surgery, right?" 

Jae-ha becomes Yeo-ju's savior and favorite. However, five years later, he ends his life by making an extreme choice... Yeo-ju, in shock, cries out to a shooting star to save him. 

Did her wish come true? She goes back seven years and possesses the body of Jang Bo-ran, a top idol at the time and a judge on the audition program "I Am the Strongest Idol"... Among the audition participants is trainee Park Jae-ha!

"Just like you saved me, I will save you this time."

The once-prosperous Japanese ninja are said to have been dismantled by the GHQ following the Pacific War and disappeared. In reality, the ninja still exist in secret, and their number is rumored to be as many as 200,000. Some of the elite ninja work behind the scenes at the national level. On the other hand, the ninja at the end of the line are often unable to find work. One such ninja, Kuro Kumogakure, is living the life of a NEET.

A bottom-feeder JK and a yankee boy. Bento connects these two opposites in this coming-of-age love story!

One day, Omori Sizuka, a high school girl who loves to eat and is bullied by bullies, discovers the secret that Akira Kurose, aka "Ashura-kun," the only tough yankee at school, enjoys cooking. The next day at lunchtime, Akira summons Sizuka to the rooftop and asks her to eat his homemade lunch box to keep her mouth shut.

"A delinquent guy likes a chubby girl for who she is but he’s worried about her health cause she’s eating nothing but unhealthy food. So he starts making lunches for her so her diet gets better and then romance begins"
Indeed it is, indeed it does. A street action comic featuring the life of Jang Gwangnam leading up to the creation of the Killberos Tribe.

Entirely unknown nationwide is a high school student named Shino Ryuuji. At a national convention in his last year of junior high, he was allowed to go to a U-16 training camp as a Japanese representative candidate; that was to show a single part. In a friendly match against the U-17 Spain representative, Ryuuji was selected as one of the chosen to bathe in the severe baptism of the world! In the overwhelming reality, many soccer fans were fascinated by Japan's first-of-its-kind genuine story, the long-awaited serialization!

altTitles.ja: ヘブンバーンズレッド公式４コマ

description.vi: Loạt manga 4 khung tranh về sinh hoạt thường nhật của các chiến binh Quân đoàn Seraph theo phong cách đáng yêu và hài hước, giúp ta biết thêm một phần về tính cách và quan điểm sống của họ.

description.en: Ume Sasaki, a senior in high school, is helping out at her great-grandmother's ryokan during this summer vacation. She goes to the ryokan in hopes of getting some hints about her future...? This is the brightest and most dazzling "memory (memoir)" of the girls.
description.ja:
高校最後の夏休み、ひいばあちゃんが営む旅館「花瀧屋」の手伝いにやってきた佐々木梅。
到着したその夜、梅は露天風呂で滑って、湯船に落ちてしまう。
引っ張り上げてくれたのは…〝ねえさま〟と呼んでくる不思議な少女・藤野だった。

いつもと変わらない花瀧屋。
だけど、炭を使った見知らぬ暖房器具があったり、そもそも季節が夏から冬になっていたり。
これって、もしかして…〝タイムスリップ〟？

時代を越え、少女たちの一途な思いが交差する青春冒険譚、第1巻。

description.en: Jake, a seemingly average office worker, unexpectedly finds himself thrust into a fantasy world teeming with dangers and opportunities. Rather than succumbing to fear, Jake thrives in this unfamiliar realm. As he navigates the expansive multiverse, his power grows and he transforms—evolving from a mundane office worker into a true apex hunter.

altTitles.ja-ro: Inu ga Hito ni Naru Hanashi

altTitles.zh-hk: 我家碰太變成了人類這件事

altTitles.ja: ポン太がヒトになりまして。

altTitles.vi: Ponta nhà tôi bỗng dưng hóa thành người?!

description.en:
A slapstick comedy that involves a town and its neighbors where “pet dogs” have become “humans”!
Feelings that couldn’t be conveyed as a dog can now be understood directly…!?
description.fr: Un jour, les chiens de cette ville sont soudainement devenus humains. L'histoire suit la vie de Saki et de son chien Ponta.
description.ru: В один прекрасный день домашние собаки в этом городе вдруг превращаются в людей. История рассказывает о жизни хозяйки Саки и ее собаки Понты.
description.uk: Одного разу всі собаки, які жили в цьому місті раптово перетворилися на людей. Історія розповідає про життя Сакі, власниці, та Понти, її пса.
description.vi: Một ngày đẹp trời bỗng dưng toàn bộ chó trong một thị trấn nọ hóa thành người...Và cô nàng Saki phải sống(vật lộn) với một bé Husky hóa thành trai đẹp XD

description.en: Some children live in a comfortably numb world, surrounded by walls. However, one day, a kid named Tokio receives a message asking "Do you want to go outside of the outside?"    Now, from the Heaven that is starting to crumble, the children begin their adventure!
description.fa:
دنیایی پوچ که بچه‌ها در آن با رفاه کامل همراه با دیوارهایی که درون و بیرون را جدا می‌کنند، زندگی می‌کنند اما همه‌ی این‌ها زمانی تغییر می‌کند که یکی از بچه‌ها به نام تاکیو‌ پیامی با این متن دریافت می‌کند: «می‌خوای به خارج از چیزی که اون بیرونه بری؟»

حال از بهشتی که درحال نابودی است بچه‌ها ماجراجویی خود را آغاز می‌کنند.
description.fr: Dans un immense jardin coupé du monde, un groupe d'enfants jouit d'une vie douce et d'insouciance, protégé par des scientifiques. Le monde extérieur leur est inconnu mais certains d'entre eux se questionnent : qu'y a-t-il au-delà des murs de leur paradis ?Pendant ce temps, dans un Japon dévasté par un mystérieux cataclysme, Maru et Kiruko, deux adolescents de la génération post-catastrophe, tentent de survivre dans un monde désolé peuplé de pillards et de monstres difformes. Leur objectif : atteindre "le Paradis".
description.ja: 美しい壁に囲まれた世界で暮らす子供たち。少年・トキオはある日、「外の外に行きたいですか？」というメッセージを受け取る。一方、外では、マルとおねえちゃんがサバイバル生活をしながら、天国を求めて、魔境となった世界を旅している。未来の日本を「あね散歩」。
description.pt: Em um mundo pós-apocalíptico, dois jovens: Maru um garoto amigável e que esconde vários segredos; E Kiruko, uma garota impetuosa e protetora. Juntos eles vagam pelo cenário desolado em busca de um chamado "paraíso". Enquanto isso, em um outro lugar isolado do resto do mundo, vivem várias crianças sem saber do que acontece no exterior. Como essas duas histórias vão se conectar?
description.ru:
Две истории, которые непременно связаны…

Таинственный Мару — мальчик, у которого есть одна цель: найти «Рай»! На пути к ним он обрёл телохранителя — Кируко. Она тоже не так уж проста, как может показаться на первый взгляд. В этом путешествии к «Небесам» они вместе посетят много мест ушедшей эпохи и встретят разных врагов!

Токио — девочка, которая живёт за великими стенами «Небес»! Это место можно назвать раем. Вокруг высокие деревья, зеленая трава, плантации свежих овощей и даже есть небольшой водоем! Вместе с Токио здесь можно встретить и других детей, каждый из которых обладает своим особенным даром. В один из дней Токио получает сообщение: «Ты хочешь выбраться отсюда?» Кажется, с этого момента что-то странное начинает твориться в пределах «Небес»…
description.pt-br: Em um mundo pós-apocalíptico, dois jovens: Maru um garoto amigável e que esconde vários segredos; E Kiruko, uma garota impetuosa e protetora. Juntos eles vagam pelo cenário desolado em busca de um chamado "paraíso". Enquanto isso, em um outro lugar isolado do resto do mundo, vivem várias crianças sem saber do que acontece no exterior. Como essas duas histórias vão se conectar?

title.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Villainess

altTitles.zh: 杀死男主然后成为女魔头

altTitles.ru: Убить главного героя, чтобы стать злодейкой

altTitles.zh-ro: Sha Si Nan Zhu Ranhou Chengwei Nv Mo Tou
Shā Sǐ Nán Zhǔ Ránhòu Chéngwéi Nǚ Mó Tóu

altTitles.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Demoness

description.en:
After killing the male lead, the originally innocent girl transformed into a villainess.
Just as she was about to enjoy her newfound freedom, she died a violent death and returned back to the start of the game.
Having carried over with her all the skills she acquired in her previous "playthrough", she was prepared to kill the male lead again; however, the current circumstances seem a bit... strange?
description.ru:
Убив главного героя, девушка становится монстром в глазах других, но, собираясь насладиться свободой, трагично погибает и оказывается в начале игры. Сохранив знания и навыки из прошлой жизни, она собирается повторить своё убийство, однако происходящее кажется немного… странным.
«Да кто же ты такой?!»
description.zh: 杀死男主角后，原小白花女二黑化成了女魔头，正当她快意江湖的时候却暴毙回到游戏的开头。继承了上周目所有能力的她准备先下手为强再次杀死男主，只是现在的情况好像有点……意外？ “不对，你到底谁啊——？！”

title.en: Ataerareta Skill wo Tsukatte Kasei de Isekai Bijotachi to Ichaicha shitai

altTitles.ja: 与えられたスキルを使って稼いで異世界美女達とイチャイチャしたい

altTitles.id: Aku Ingin Menggunakan Keterampilan Yang Diberikan Untuk Mendapatkan Uang Dan Menggoda Wanita Cantik Dari Dunia Lain

altTitles.ja-ro: Ataerareta Skill wo Tsukatte Kasei de Isekai Bijotachi to Ichaicha shitai

altTitles.en: I Want to Use the Skills Given to Earn Money and Flirt With Beauties From Other Worlds

description.en: That day, Ishida Yamada was working part-time as usual. When he opened the back door after finishing his part-time job, he found a blank space and a person who called himself God. It was by chance that he was chosen by God to go to another world. He was perplexed, but decided to live anyway. Thinking about how to survive in this other world using the skills he received from God, he tries his best to have a physical relationship with a beautiful woman in this other world.
description.ja: その日も山田一太はいつもと変わらずバイトをしていた。バイトが終わり裏口の扉を開けると、そこには真っ白な空間が広がっていて、神と名乗る者がいた。 一太は偶然神によって選ばれ、異世界に行くことになった。一太は戸惑いながらも、取り合えず生きていこうと決めた。 神からもらったスキルを使って如何にこの異世界を生き抜くか考えながら、一太はこの異世界にいる美女と肉体関係を持つために色々と頑張っていく。
description.es-la: Ese día, Ichita Yamada estaba trabajando medio tiempo como de costumbre. Cuando abrió la puerta trasera después de terminar su trabajo de medio tiempo, encontró un espacio en blanco y una persona que se hacía llamar Dios. Fue por casualidad que Dios lo eligió para ir a otro mundo. Estaba perplejo, pero decidió vivir de todos modos. Pensando en cómo sobrevivir en este otro mundo usando las habilidades que recibió de Dios, hace todo lo posible por tener una relación física con una mujer hermosa en este otro mundo.

description.en: The popular gal who was my childhood friend is secretly uploading provocative selfies!? In his quest to uncover the secret of this popular girl, high school boy Riku discovers that his own deeply hidden emotions were being observed by someone else… A sweet yet suffocatingly intense blend of youth, love, and suspense.
description.ja: 幼なじみの人気ギャルは、過激な自撮りをアップする裏アカ女子！？人気者の秘密を探ろうとする男子高校生・陸は、逆に自分の隠していた心の底を、別の誰かに覗かれていたことを知る‥‥。溺れるほどに甘く、息もできないほど苦しい、青春×愛憎サスペンス。
description.es-la:
¿La chica popular que era mi amiga de la infancia está subiendo en secreto provocativos selfies de cosplay?
En su búsqueda por descubrir el secreto de esta chica popular, el chico de instituto Riku descubre que sus propias emociones, profundamente ocultas, estaban siendo observadas por otra persona...

Una dulce pero asfixiante mezcla de juventud, amor y suspenso.

description.bg: Кашилара Мей напоследък усеща нещо странно... Точно когато се опитва да си обясни това странно чувство, момиче от училището им, Калабата Мичико, скача от покрива и се самоубива. Мей, която става свидетел на инцидента, започва да се нарича "Калабата Мичико", а нейният съученик Карая Тацухико се заплита в тази мистерия. Психологически проблем ли е това, или паранормално явление? Произведение, което се фокусира върху дълбините на психологията.
description.en:
Kashiwara Mei has been feeling something strange lately... Just as she is trying to make sense of this strange feeling, a girl from their school, Kawabata Michiko jumps off the roof and commits suicide. Mei, who witnesses the incident, starts calling herself "Kawabata Michiko", and her clasmate Karaya Tatsuhiko is tangled in this mystery. 

Is it a psychological problem, or a psychic phenomenon? A work that focuses on deep psychology.
Help! Why is my blind date my 'ex'-boyfriend?!

Touya now has a new girlfriend, Yuki Morikawa–but before they enter college she is going to debut as an idol. How will this new development affect their relationship? What about the current idol, Rina Ogata, who seems to have set her sights on Touya?

altTitles.th: มังกรฟ้าป่วนยุทธภพ

description.en: A mysterious stranger rides into town. The peaceful village of Gang-Ho is disturbed when Yongbi, a seemingly foolish bounty hunter, comes to town looking to claim the bounty for the leader of Gang-Ho's deadliest clan of assassins. Will Yongbi collect the bounty unscathed, or will he fall victim to a vengeful pack of assassins hell-bent on retribution for their captured leader?

altTitles.ja: 今日もハジメ先輩が好きすぎる

description.en: Kokomi enters into a new school but ends up tearing her clothes. The kind and popular Hajime lends her some clothes and she falls in love with him at first sight, after not being able to speak to him for a long time, she discovers a terrible truth about him but is undeterred into trying to win his heart.

A male engineer transmigrated into another world, and became a prince. This place strikingly resembles the Middle Ages of Europe, but at the same time, it seems kind of different? Witches truly exist, and they even possess magic powers! Magic powers are productive forces! Save the witches, liberate the productive forces! Open map, fight demons, break conspiracies, climb up the science and technology tree, and open the path of hardcore ‘farming’!
description.ru: Чэн Янь прошел сквозь время и попал в мир, подобный Средневековой Европе, став Роландом, 4-м принцем королевства. Но этот мир не такой, к какому он уже привык. Ведьмы и магия здесь — нормальное явление. Сможет ли Роланд заполучить трон короля и решить выпавшие на его долю проблемы? Только его опыт современных технологий и помощь ведьм, известных как «слуги Дьявола», позволят ему добиться успеха!

title.en: Hitsuji no Kawa wo Kita Kemono

description.en: Daichi's big sister is getting married, and to a super hot guy named Jun Igawa! When they first meet, Daichi's suspicious; what does this accomplished, rich, attractive guy see in his sister? But Jun seems like such a nice guy, and slowly, Daichi starts to drop his guard… is Jun really everything he seems? Or is he a devil in disguise?

altTitles.ja: ご注文はうさぎですか？

altTitles.zh: 请问您今天要来点兔子吗

description.en: One day, Cocoa arrived in a town for a work-stay program as organized by her school. There, she excitingly entered the café "Rabbit House," expecting to be able to cuddle rabbits, but instead she found the Kafuu residence, her new home where she will be staying. In this town she will meet her precious and important friends, a responsible, calm but cute girl named Chino, a tough and soldier-esque girl named Rize, a spacey and quintessentially Japanese girl named Chiya, and the ordinary but dignified Syaro.

Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!
description.ru: Пробравшись на невольничий корабль, Юлиан отправляется на континент вместе с сотней рабов, жаждущих свободы... Но что ждёт его впереди?!
description.vi: Lén đi lậu trên một con tàu, Julian ra đi tìm đến đại lục cùng với một trăm người nô lệ khác... Ai ai cũng khao khát có được tự do, thế nhưng rồi...?!

description.en:
Koto, Aya, and Erika were secretly in love with each other.

Koto's thoughts reach Aya for a short while, but Aya disappears as if she had been spirited away.

Seven years later, however, Aya appears to Koto and Erika as she was then...

title.en: Kokan Musou ~Kiraware Yuusha wa Mazoku ni Aisareru~

altTitles.ja: 股間無双～嫌われ勇者は魔族に愛される～

altTitles.en: Unparallelled Groin: The Hated Hero is Loved by the Demons

altTitles.zh-hk: 股間無雙～被討厭的勇者卻被魔族所愛～

description.en:
Kantarou, who has ascended to heaven because he is too sick, reincarnates in a different world. Kantarou, who is distorted in character and is a fatty, is disliked even after reincarnating, but notices that a cloudy potion that cures anything from his crotch appears. Moreover, it also has the effect of powering up the demons, and it will be loved by the demons…!? A different world reincarnation fantasy that is unmatched in the crotch!!!
___
**Alt Official Raws:**
- [Comic DAYS](https://comic-days.com/episode/3269754496640214685)
- [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/55354)
description.ja: ヌキすぎて昇天してしまった汗太郎(かんたろう)は異世界に転生する。キモデブで性格も歪んでいる汗太郎は転生した先でも嫌われてしまうが、自分の股間から何でも治してしまう白濁色のポーションが出ることに気づく。しかもそれは魔族をパワーアップさせる効果も持っていて、魔族からも求愛されることに……!?股間で無双する異世界転生ファンタジー!!!

description.en: After countless regressions, Persepe finally conquers all five male protagonists in a harrowing reverse harem game. Just when she thinks she’s free, a message appears:  *"Secret Mode unlocked! Find the true male lead to escape."*  Hope reignites—she only needs to woo the real protagonist to return to her original world. But there’s one problem:  *"So… who’s the real male lead?"*  With no clear answers and hidden challenges, Persepe must navigate shifting alliances, cryptic clues, and her own growing feelings. Can she uncover the truth and finally break free? Or will she remain trapped in the game forever?

As a child, Thorfinn sat at the feet of the great Leif Ericson and thrilled to wild tales of a land far to the west. But his youthful fantasies were shattered by a mercenary raid. Raised by the Vikings who murdered his family, Thorfinn became a terrifying warrior, forever seeking to kill the band's leader, Askeladd, and avenge his father. Sustaining Thorfinn through his ordeal are his pride in his family and his dreams of a fertile westward land, a land without war or slavery… the land Leif called Vinland.  

---
- **Won the Japan Media Arts Award Division Grand Prize in 2009**
- **Won the 36th Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2012**
description.ru: Эта история случилась в начале XI века, когда викинги, безраздельно господствовавшие в северных морях, грабили побережья Франции и Англии. В эпоху, где оружие значило больше, нежели слова, маленький мальчик невольно оказывается косвенной причиной гибели своего отца. Повзрослев и став на путь воина, он жаждет честного поединка с убийцей отца – легендарным главарём отряда викингов-наемников, но возраст и отсутствие опыта не позволяют ему сделать это. Чтобы не упускать своего врага из виду, юноша вступает в его отряд и в награду за выполнение тяжелого боевого задания требует поединка с ним, но терпит поражение. Юноша продолжает прилагать все усилия, чтобы осуществить свою месть. Внезапно он оказывается вовлечён в куда более кровавое столкновение…
description.tr: Çocukken Thorfinn, büyük Leif Ericson'un ayaklarının dibinde oturur ve batıdaki uzak diyarların vahşi masallarıyla heyecanlanırdı. Ama gençlik hayalleri bir paralı asker baskınıyla paramparça oldu. Ailesini öldüren Vikingler tarafından yetiştirilen Thorfinn, grubun lideri Askeladd'ı öldürmek ve babasının intikamını almak isteyen korkunç bir savaşçı oldu. Thorfinn'i çileli yaşamı boyunca ayakta tutan, ailesiyle olan gururu ve batıdaki bereketli topraklara, savaşın ve köleliğin olmadığı bir ülkeye, Leif'in Vinland adını verdiği topraklara dair hayalleridir.
description.pt-br: Thorfinn é filho de Thors, um lendário guerreiro viking, mas que após anos no campo de batalha, descobre uma coisa mais maravilhosa que matar seus iguais. Viver sua própria vida, em paz. Mas os ventos lhe trazem uma notícia que atrapalhará seus dias de paz, e Thorfinn, seu filho, pouco sabe desta vida passada de guerra de seu pai. Após descobrir o passado de seu pai, Thorfinn se revolta contra ele, e sai para a guerra junto de seu pai, mas quando reconhece o verdadeiro valor dele, já é tarde demais. Agora Thorfinn deverá seguir sua própria vida, seguindo valores que seu pai lhe ensinou, mas sem perder sua coragem. Este é só o começo desta grande saga de Thorfinn que acompanha os Vikings no século XI!

description.en:
‘Ha Miro’, a clumsy yet loveable rookie magazine editor, meets mosquito man ‘Mo Ginam’, who can become a ‘normal [ilban]’ person (when together) when ‘blood [pi]’ is ‘cha’.

‘Ha Miro’, the rookie editor for a third-rate fashion magazine company receives an e-mail from rookie model ‘Lee Jihyeon’s manager. With an excited heart, she excitedly sends a deposit over the phone……
description.ko: 어설프지만 사랑스러운 패션잡지 신입 에디터 '하미로', '피'가 '차'야(모여야) '일반'인이 될 수 있는 모기 인간 '모기남'을 만나다.  삼류 패션 잡지 회사의 신입 에디터 '하미로' 어느 날 떠오르는 신예 모델 '이지현'의 매니저라는 사람의 메일을 받게 된다. 들뜬 마음으로 통화를 하고 계약금을 보내버린 그녀……
